reviewText: OK, so I saw this in my astronomy class, and couldn't help myself; I mean how often do you get so see a science film that has The Simpsons in it? The film does a great job of explaining such a complex event to everyday people. I showed it to my niece and nephew who were 10 and eight, they loved it. I can only hope that the other films will captivate them and encourage their learning like this one did!
